yours_jeeva wrote:

> Yes Mike,
> But I am missing something.
>

> for my HomeInterface.
> And placed the whole file path on classpath prior to junit.jar

And your 'patched' file lives in
c:/whatever/junit/runner/excluded.properties, and the classpath refers
c:/whatever before junit.jar, right?

I'm guessing the classpath is incorrect.
